author: felipeal
msg: MPEAR-20: add test that checks if a dependency without the new property is set correctly

author: vmassol
msg: MPCHANGES-14: Added sorting of <action> elements. It is controlled by 2 properties. The maven.changes.sort property decides whether sorting is enabled or not and the maven.changes.sort.order one decides the sort order. Defaults to add,fix,update,remove.

author: felipeal
msg: fix for MPEAR-20: changed the default value of the maven.ear.displayname
